## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                             | Type      | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `headerSize` | `header-size` | Height of the header in pixels                                          | `number`  | `200`       |
| `horizontal` | `horizontal`  | Renders the card's elements on the horizontal axis rather than vertical | `boolean` | `undefined` |
